My sister got me this shirt in Cream for Christmas and it has become my favorite warm shirt. It is so comfortable and keeps me warm. I also really like how the fabric has a bounce to it when I walk, it kind of makes me feel like a kid again and brings me a bit of nostalgic joy. I am about to purchase 2 more on different colors because I like it that much.

I was very nervous about this purchase, based on the Amazon notice that it was a frequently returned item and a few reviews with various complaints about wrinkles that wouldn't come out. I am SO glad I took the chance on a great sale price because these came yesterday and I love them!! They arrived vacuum sealed in plastic bags, so they had deep wrinkles and creases. I pulled out a small clothes steamer and noticed they relaxed pretty easily. Then I threw one in the dryer with a wet towel, and by the time I checked again, the sweater was perfectly unwrinkled. The black color is nice, even dark black (the same as a pair of black dress slacks I was wearing when I opened the package). The apricot is true to color and lovely. The fit is loose and not cropped, and the sleeve is very cute. The horizontal ribbing all over steps it up from the usual solid color sweater. I just love these and will be watching to grab some brighter colors the next time i see them on special!

I absolutely love this sweater! The material is incredibly soft and cozy, making it perfect for chilly fall and winter days. I’m 5’2” and 205 lbs, and the large fits me perfectly—just the right amount of room without feeling oversized or snug. The boat neck and lantern sleeves give it such a stylish and chic look, while still being super comfortable for everyday wear.  It’s versatile enough for any occasion, whether I’m at the office, running errands, or heading out for a casual dinner. I’ve gotten so many compliments on it already! It washes well (I used a laundry bag as recommended) and dries beautifully on a hanger without losing its shape.  If you’re looking for a sweater that’s warm, fashionable, and flattering, this is the one. Highly recommend!
